content.text: 6 Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cubed
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "6 Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cubed" )
( ing-1 "2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed" )
( ing-7 "2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese" )

content.text: 0) Place the potatoes and sweet potatoes in a large pot with enough water to cover.
4) In a large bowl, mash the potatoes.
5) Gradually mix in butter, heavy cream, chicken bouillon, brown sugar, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "mix in"@13:19 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "butter"@20:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "heavy cream"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "chicken bouillon"@41:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "brown sugar"@59:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "pepper"@76:82 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Transfer the mixture to a medium baking dish, and top with Monterey Jack cheese.
7) Broil uncovered in the preheated oven 10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Broil"@3:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the preheated oven"@22:40 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "10 minutes"@41:51 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until the cheese is melted and lightly browned"@56:102 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
